Text:
Lindoffs,

Could you please make sure to finish seeding THE NEXT THREE DAYS? Everybody is at 99.9% for a few days now... Nobody gets to finish downloading that torrent. So not to waste your effort, pls finish seeding. Thx

Regarding the THE NEXT THREE DAYS torrent at 99.9%:

Found the SOLUTION to play the 99.9% downloaded file.

Just delete the ".bc!" after .ISO, then it can play already as an ISO file.
